scripts.build:ruler: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest dist/vue-ruler --name DLRuler src/components/DLRuler.vue
scripts.build:nrs: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest dist/vue-nrs-bar --name NrsBar src/components/NrsBar.vue
scripts.build:nut: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest dist/vue-nut-bar --name NutBar src/components/NutBar.vue
